nl.already_paired: This device has already been paired.
nl.autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
nl.certification_benefits: Another benefit to using certified plugins is, HOOBS support. Since HOOBS tests certified plugins, we are familiar with the plugin and can help troubleshoot issues. And in the event where the plugins is broke, we can work with the plugin developer on your behalf to help address the issue.
nl.certification_program: The HOOBS certification program helps promote plugins that work. We work with the plugin developer to address issues, and help keep the plugins simple and easy to configure.
nl.config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.
nl.confirm_action: Are you sure you want to continue?
nl.confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to leave?
nl.confirm_factory_reset: Are you sure you want to reset this device?
nl.confirm_reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot this device?
nl.confirm_refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh?
nl.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
nl.confirm_restart: Are you sure you want to restart the bridge?
nl.country_code_message: Stel de landcode in op waar dit apparaat is. Dit wordt gebruikt voor weersvoorspellingen
nl.device_address: Enter the IP address your HOOBS device
nl.device_hostname: Assign a name for this device
nl.end_port_invalid: Eindpoort is onjuist. Het moet een nummer zijn tussen 1 en 65535
nl.factory_reset_message: This will remove all plugins, configurations and settings.
nl.help_welcome: HOOBS is an ecosystem that aims to unify and simplfy the "Smart Home". We beilive that you should be able to use the devices you want, and not be locked into one provider's solution. If you want to use Google Home for your voice control and Apple Home for your routines, go ahead, HOOBS will make tht happen for you. HOOBS can connect your devices togeather by the use of plugins. HOOBS has "Certified Plugins", and it supports Homebridge plugins. This means you have over 1,000 choices when it comes to your Smart Home tech.
nl.home_pin_message: De PIN die gebruikt is om Homebridge toe te voegen aan Apple Home.
nl.home_username_message: De gebruikersnaam die Apple Home gebruikt om Homebridge te identificeren.
nl.homekit_disconnect: Hiermee wordt de verbinding tussen Homebridge en Apple Home verbroken. U moet opnieuw koppelen.
nl.hoobs_unavailable: HOOBS is not available on this device.
nl.invalid_mac_address: This device doesn't have a valid MAC address.
nl.invalid_port_range: Ongeldig poortbereik, de eindpoort moet groter zijn dan de startpoort.
nl.language_message: Stel de systeemtaal in of stel het in als automatisch, zodat de taal van je browser gebruikt wordt.
nl.latitude_message: Set the latitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
nl.longitude_message: Set the longitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
nl.name: Naam
nl.plugin_select_device: Select a device to install this plugin.
nl.polling_seconds_invalid: Refresh interval is invalid. It must be an integer between 1 second and 30 minutes.
nl.polling_seconds_message: Refresh the accessory states interval in seconds.
nl.postal_code_message: Stel de postcode in waar dit apparaat zich bevindt. Dit wordt gebruikt voor weersvoorspellingen
nl.range_name_message: Een poortbereik beschrijving die gebruikt wordt om het poortbereik the identificeren.
nl.server_port_invalid: Server port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
nl.server_port_message: Set the main port the server runs on.
nl.service_description_message: Gebruikt met de naam om Homebrdige helpen te identificeren in het systeem.
nl.service_name_message: Gebruikt om Homebridge te identificeren in het systeem.
nl.service_port_invalid: Service poort is ongeldig. Het moet een nummer zijn tussen 1 en 65535.
nl.service_port_message: De poort waar Homebridge op draait, standaard is dit 51826.
nl.start_port_invalid: Start poort is ongeldig. Het moet een nummer zijn tussen 1 en 65535.
nl.temp_units_message: Set the units you want temprature sensors to display.
nl.time_format_message: This only affects times in the interface.
